trans-unit.target: TEXT_REGWILRINGOFASH_00143_LLOONGAH_000<tab>What brings you to me, adventurer?
TEXT_REGWILRINGOFASH_00143_SCENE00000Q<tab>What will you ask?
TEXT_REGWILRINGOFASH_00143_SCENE00000A1<tab>Tell me about yourself.
TEXT_REGWILRINGOFASH_00143_SCENE00000A2<tab>What is this place?
TEXT_REGWILRINGOFASH_00143_SCENE00000A3<tab>Nothing.
TEXT_REGWILRINGOFASH_00143_LLOONGAH_010<tab>I am Loonh Gah, and I am a warrior of the Brotherhood of Ash. That is all there is worth knowing.

TEXT_REGWILRINGOFASH_00143_LLOONGAH_011<tab>You may see before you the body of a Miqo'te, but my soul burns bright with the pride of the Amalj'aa. Do not expect me to sympathize with your “civilized” ways!

TEXT_REGWILRINGOFASH_00143_LLOONGAH_012<tab>Do you see this mask? It is a symbol of my will and resolve. When I received this gift from Hamujj Gah, our warleader, I was born anew─freed from the enfeebling chains of my past.
TEXT_REGWILRINGOFASH_00143_LLOONGAH_020<tab>You stand in the Ring of Ash, the main camp of the Brotherhood. We are a gathering of Amalj'aa soldiers who follow the command of Warleader Hamujj Gah.

TEXT_REGWILRINGOFASH_00143_LLOONGAH_021<tab>It was our warleader who liberated the honorable and the strong from the corrupting influence of our fallen brethren, and established this final bastion of Amalj'aa pride.

TEXT_REGWILRINGOFASH_00143_LLOONGAH_022<tab>We have but one goal, and that is to attain the peak of martial perfection! The fanatical cowards that grovel at Ifrit's feet for scraps of power are a stain of shame upon this holy land!
TEXT_REGWILRINGOFASH_00143_LLOONGAH_000_050<tab>Adventurer! I did not expect to see you again so soon. What cause brings you back to Thanalan?
TEXT_REGWILRINGOFASH_00143_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you ask?
TEXT_REGWILRINGOFASH_00143_A2_000_001<tab>How does the Brotherhood fare?
TEXT_REGWILRINGOFASH_00143_A2_000_002<tab>What can you tell me of the Ring of Ash?
TEXT_REGWILRINGOFASH_00143_A2_000_003<tab>Nothing.

TEXT_REGWILRINGOFASH_00143_LLOONGAH_000_100<tab>My brethren and I endure as do the stones of the holy land. We continue our crusade against the remnants of the Flamefangs, and battle Zanr'ak's deluded zealots.
TEXT_REGWILRINGOFASH_00143_LLOONGAH_000_101<tab>As long as the flames of their infernal god burn, our war will not end.
TEXT_REGWILRINGOFASH_00143_LLOONGAH_000_102<tab>You know well our resolve─indeed, you are one of the few outsiders I have met who can match it.

TEXT_REGWILRINGOFASH_00143_LLOONGAH_000_103<tab>Even so, the years of conflict have taken their toll. Perhaps someday, when my vengeance is sated, I will visit one of these grand cities of which the merchants tell.
TEXT_REGWILRINGOFASH_00143_LLOONGAH_000_104<tab>...Do you think they would object to the mask?
TEXT_REGWILRINGOFASH_00143_LLOONGAH_000_110<tab>The Ring of Ash? I may have told you of its significance before, but it is the main camp of the Brotherhood.

TEXT_REGWILRINGOFASH_00143_LLOONGAH_000_111<tab>It was our warleader who liberated the honorable and the strong from the corrupting influence of our fallen brethren, and established this final bastion of Amalj'aa pride.

TEXT_REGWILRINGOFASH_00143_LLOONGAH_000_112<tab>We have but one goal, and that is to attain the peak of martial perfection! The fanatical cowards that grovel at Ifrit's feet for scraps of power are a stain of shame upon this holy land!

TEXT_REGWILRINGOFASH_00143_LLOONGAH_000_150<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! What brings you back to our ranks this <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((night)) ((day)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((day)) ((night)) /var>)) /var>?
TEXT_REGWILRINGOFASH_00143_Q3_000_000<tab>What will you ask?
TEXT_REGWILRINGOFASH_00143_A3_000_001<tab>Tell me about yourself.
TEXT_REGWILRINGOFASH_00143_A3_000_002<tab>What is this place?
TEXT_REGWILRINGOFASH_00143_A3_000_003<tab>Nothing.

TEXT_REGWILRINGOFASH_00143_LLOONGAH_000_200<tab>My brethren and I endure as do the stones of the holy land. We continue our crusade against the remnants of the Flamefangs, and battle Zanr'ak's deluded zealots.
TEXT_REGWILRINGOFASH_00143_LLOONGAH_000_201<tab>As for me, my shameful defeat at the hands of the Ebon Claw that day still cuts deep.

TEXT_REGWILRINGOFASH_00143_LLOONGAH_000_202<tab>I had always considered myself a true warrior, the equal of any, but it is clear to me now. I must strive ever harder if I am to achieve the pinnacle of martial prowess. But mark my words: the day will come when none can stand before me.

TEXT_REGWILRINGOFASH_00143_LLOONGAH_000_203<tab>Perhaps one day, when I have achieved the pinnacle of martial perfection, I will travel again to Ul'dah, this time as myself─a proud warrior of the Amalj'aa! And should you or anyone else hand me another of those frilly frocks, I shall rend it to shreds with a fierceness I reserve for a mortal foe!

TEXT_REGWILRINGOFASH_00143_LLOONGAH_000_204<tab>Does something amuse you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!? I suggest you purge that memory from your mind before my blade finds itself in your skull!

TEXT_REGWILRINGOFASH_00143_LLOONGAH_000_210<tab>Have you suffered a blow to the head, honored ally? You stand in the Ring of Ash, the main camp of the Brotherhood, as well you should know. We are a gathering of Amalj'aa soldiers who follow the command of Warleader Hamujj Gah.

TEXT_REGWILRINGOFASH_00143_LLOONGAH_000_211<tab>It was our warleader who liberated the honorable and the strong from the corrupting influence of our fallen brethren, and established this final bastion of Amalj'aa pride.

TEXT_REGWILRINGOFASH_00143_LLOONGAH_000_212<tab>We have but one goal, and that is to attain the peak of martial perfection! The fanatical cowards that grovel at Ifrit's feet for scraps of power are a stain of shame upon this holy land!
